scenario_text.value: Oh, Takuma! Look! Ta-daaa!
Whoa! What is that?

It’s this shredded cable I just found.
It’s like a snake! Were you scared?

This is a terrible time for surprises like
that!
I’m sorry, Takuma. Miu was really scared too.
Syakomon? That was a secret!

But she tried her best to pretend there was
nothing wrong.

She’s battling her fears, so go easy on her,
okay?
Ugh. Just tell him everything, why don’t you?

(Wow. Miu’s doing great.
Solving problems all on her own.)

(Trying to not ask for my help, even though
she’s still so young...)
(What should I say to Miu?)
That’s great, Miu!
Look out! A snake!
I’m proud of you.
That’s great, Miu!
Wow, great job, Miu.
She’s kicking butt!

Stop! You’re embarrassing me!
Syakomon shouldn’t surprise me like that!

(I embarrassed her...
But I really did think she was great.)
Look out! A snake!
Look out behind you, Miu! A real snake this time!
Where, where? Yikes!
Hang on, Takuma! There’s no snake!

Stop fooling around!
Trying to scare me like that...
What? It was just a little payback...
I’m proud of you.
That was something else. I’m proud of you.

Don’t say it like that!
It wasn’t anything special...

Really?
You’re kicking butt and taking names!

Right? That was so scary that I think I’m
finally back to normal now.
But really, it was nothing special guys...

I don’t want to be a burden on anyone.
I just want to take care of myself is all.

You can ask for help, though, if it’s too
scary. We gotta have each others’ backs.
Thank you, Takuma...

Let’s go get Miyuki back.
That way we can all go home.
With Syakomon and Agumon, too!

How did it go with Renamon?
Things looked bad and I was worried...
